## The CCIDM Email Process

1) **Idea**  
   - **Owner:** Worker or Boss  
   - **Output:** One-line brief (objective, audience hypothesis)

2) **Proposal Document**  
   - **Action:** Copy the [“Email Proposal”](https://livecsupomona.sharepoint.com/:w:/r/sites/insights/Shared%20Documents/CCIDM_Files/1.%20Student%20Success%20Programs/1.%20CCIDM%20Internship%20Program/2.%20Internship%20Jobs%20by%20Positions/0-1.%20Digital%20Marketing%20Lead/7.%20Emails/MSDM%20Info%20Session%20Email%202025/MSDM%20Info%20Session%209-23%20Email.docx?d=w9584282595bf4631ab55f4fbb62b02c3&csf=1&web=1&e=57vz0r) template into the correct folder  
   - **Fill:** Title · Content outline · Segment · Send window (date/time)  
   - **Output:** Draft ready for approval

3) **Approval to Send**  
   - **Action:** Tag **Lead** for approval  
   - **Gate:** Lead approves?  
     - **No →** Revise proposal and re-request approval  
     - **Yes →** Lock proposal (record approver + timestamp)

## The CCIDM Email Process (cont'd)

4) **Build in HubSpot**  
   - **Action:** Use existing email template; set **from** name/email, legal footer, audience/segment, personalization tokens  
   - **Output:** Test-ready campaign matching the approved proposal

5) **QA & Send**  
   - **Action:** Preview on desktop/mobile (dark mode if possible); test sends to QA list; fix rendering/copy/list issues  
   - **Gate:** All checks pass?  
     - **No →** Fix and re-test  
     - **Yes →** **Send**

6) **Measure & Learn**  
   - **Wait:** Allow a reasonable window (e.g., 24–72h depending on volume)  
   - **Review:** Delivery & **bounce rate**, **CTR/CTOR**, unsubscribes/spam, etc.)  
   - **Actions:** Suppress **hard bounces**; log insights; propose next iteration

::: callout-warning
**Compliance & Hygiene** — Mail only contacts with valid marketing consent. If missing, trigger opt-in confirmation and record consent before sending.
:::


## Qualtrics → HubSpot Automation Workflow

## See it in action

- Submit a **Qualtrics** [survey on screen](https://cpp.az1.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_6WpZLH4Mh2GDluS).
- Show the **HubSpot** contact appearing.
- Show the **confirmation email** arriving.

## Problem & Success Criteria

**Pain with manual steps**

- Delays erode trust
- errors corrupt CRM
- inconsistent follow-up.

**Success criteria for today**

- ✅ **Upsert** contact by email (no duplicates)  
- ✅ **Consent** captured (timestamp/text)  
- ✅ **Instant confirmation** sent

## Data Flow (1/3) - Qualtrics → Trigger

- [**Qualtrics Interest Form**](https://cpp.pdx1.qualtrics.com/survey-builder/SV_6WpZLH4Mh2GDluS/edit?SurveyID=SV_6WpZLH4Mh2GDluS) (collect things like email, program interested in, how they heard about us, etc.).
- When that form has a **new completion**, Qualtrics will **start a workflow**, sending data to the HubSpot database.  
  [Open Qualtrics Workflow](https://cpp.pdx1.qualtrics.com/app/catalog/project-workflows?catalogContext=%7B%22state%22%3A%7B%22workflows%22%3A%7B%22workspaceId%22%3A%22SV_6WpZLH4Mh2GDluS%22%2C%22contextId%22%3A%22SV_6WpZLH4Mh2GDluS%22%2C%22workspaceType%22%3A%22survey%22%2C%22queryString%22%3A%22%253Fownership%3Dall%26workspaceId%3DSV_6WpZLH4Mh2GDluS%26workspaceType%3Dsurvey%22%7D%7D%2C%22surveyId%22%3A%22SV_6WpZLH4Mh2GDluS%22%7D&filters=%5B%7B%22groupId%22%3A%22CTG_wCF8IYOhsaqMyU1%22%2C%22tags%22%3A%5B%22CT_aA9aqbGWoLvWIxN%22%5D%7D%5D)

## Data Flow (2/3) - Mapping

- In that workflow, we will have **mapped the various survey fields** to columns in our **HubSpot database** (source, name, segment, etc.).
- This ensures the contact is created/updated correctly in the HubSpot CRM.

## Data Flow (3/3) - HubSpot Workflow & Email

- Once added to the HubSpot CRM database, they will be **automatically sent a welcome email** based on what **segment** they belong to.
- This process is a **HubSpot workflow**:  
  [Open HubSpot Workflow](https://app.hubspot.com/workflows/8046753/view/default)
- The workflow **sends an email we had previously created** specifically for the audience.


## Email Analytics - KPIs to watch in Hubspot

**Deliverability**

- **Delivery rate** = delivered / sent
- **Bounce rate** (hard vs. soft)
- **Spam complaint rate**

**Engagement**

- **Unique click rate** (unique clicks / delivered) ← primary engagement KPI
- **CTOR** (unique clicks / unique opens) — diagnostic only
- **Reply rate** (if using a monitored inbox)

**Outcome**

- **Primary conversion rate** (form fills, registrations, purchases)
- **Pipeline / revenue attribution** (if enabled)

**List health**

- **Unsubscribe rate**
- **List growth & opt-in rate** (net new, consented contacts)

::: callout-warning
**Opens are noisy.** Due to privacy proxies and prefetching, **open rate** is directional at best. Track it for **trends**, but optimize and report against **clicks and conversions**.
:::
